string sdh-ping.__doc__
Initial value:
00001 '''
00002 Measure response time of SDH
00003 
00004 - Example usage:
00005   - Measure response time of SDH connected to port 2 = COM3 :
00006     > sdh-ping.py -p 2
00007      
00008   - Measure response time of SDH connected to ESD CAN 100 times:
00009     > sdh-ping.py --can  100
00010      
00011   - Measure response time of SDH connected via TCP 1000 times:
00012     > sdh-ping.py --tcp=192.168.1.42 1000
00013 '''
